ygData.subject: Battle Of the CF
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: The Master is a small shuttle that the Protectrons came in. It was hit by an asteroid, which made it crash. It is dmaged beyond repair, and it is located

OOC: The Master is a small shuttle that the Protectrons came in. It was hit 
by an asteroid, which made it crash. It is dmaged beyond repair, and it is 
located a couple miles away from the CF.

:::The Protectrons/Torca/Sideswipe/Ratchet/Sky Lynx:::

::Chromedome destroyes the missles and dodges the sonic arc. He fires 25 
laser blasts from one gun at Dark One and 25 from the other at Breakdown::
~~~~~
::The grenade explodes in front of Brainstorm, the shrapnel hurting him a 
little bit. He fires 2 photon charges from each gun at Breakdown::
~~~~~
::One fusion blast hits Hardhead, but his tough armor takes the hit for him. 
He fires 25 crystal shards from each gun at Hiss::
~~~~~
::Highbrow gets hit by some of the rounds, but dodges most of them. He fires 
a stream of acid from each gun at Scavenger::
~~~~~
::Torca destroys the missles and the optics, but was hit by 2 of tyhe 
concussion blasts and the grenade, blowing him backwards. He fired 7 
explosive shells at Double Punch, 6 at Sixshot, 6 at Ares, and 6 at 
Reflector::
~~~~~
::Sideswipe was hit by 2 bolts and 1 missle, but destroyed the other. He 
fired 1 missle and 13 shots at Double Punch, and 1 missle and 12 shots at Sun 
Crusher::
~~~~~
::Ratchet was hit by the stinger missles and the optics, but dodged the 
concussion blasts. He fired 1 tusk missle at Manterror, 1 at Sixshot, 15 
shots from one gun at Bumblebee, and 15 shots from the other at Sun Crusher::
~~~~~
::Sky Lynx gets hit by 2 ion disks, 2 stinger missles, and 15 shots. Mech 
fluid was pouring out of his wounds. he fired 2 missles from one gun, 1 at 
Manterror, and 1 at Injector,  and 2 missles from the other gun, 1 at 
Bumblebee, and 1 at Minion::

--part1_d8.a348cb.278a066b_boundary

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
